title: Most hilarious/sick thing anybody has ever said to you in a match?
body:
im just curious how messed up this community really is ;)

my best was some guy on my team telling us if we came to his lane he was going to bite of his own p^$@s and choke us with it.., right after that he carried the entire game but he was pretty weird lol

replies.body: I once got told %%%% my own male dogs %%%% in the ass. So thats prty bad .
just out of curiosity, would it be okay if the dog was female ;)?
This community is so damn bad, I got called a Pantheon main 4 times today.
how could anybody confuse rav the troll with something as meagre as a pantheon main.. psh
I don't even like reading that...
Stupid noob make me so boring...

My team started having a discussion about how the 3 void champs on our team would "mate" which eachother. 
({{champion:121}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:31}}) [I'm not even joking] I was Cho and the guy who started it ({{champion:57}}) asked me if it looked like cho even had a... you know. most awkward discussion i've ever had in league. Even worse is i was using the Gentlemen Cho Skin. Turns out our team actually won the game even though our Kha and Kog left because of the discussion :D

> [{quoted}](name=MoodswingModz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=PNZjohEo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-11T14:34:40.198+0000)
> My team started having a discussion about how the 3 void champs on our team would "mate" which eachother. ({{champion:121}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:31}}) (I'm not even joking) I was Cho

Watch out 6 stack Cho attack ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
